text:
Patricia Gallerneau ("née" Sérézat; 9 September 1954 – 7 July 2019) was a French politician. She was a member of the Democratic Movement. She was elected to the National Assembly in June 2017, serving until two days before her death in July 2019. She represented the department of Vendée. She was born in the 20th arrondissement of Paris.
Gallerneau died of cancer on 7 July 2019, at the age of 64.
